sentences.sContent: From the etymology speaking, anthropology is the study of science.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the etymology speaking, anthropology is the study of science.
sentences.sCn: 从语源学上讲，人类学是研究人的科学。

sentences.sContent: So the real etymology is that it appeared, evidently as slang, in around 1700.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the real etymology is that it appeared, evidently as slang, in around 1700.
sentences.sCn: 真正的词源似乎是这样的：它作为俚语出现在1700年左右。

sentences.sContent: Some of it is about etymology, about the nature of words and their casual links with the elements around us.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of it is about etymology, about the nature of words and their casual links with the elements around us.
sentences.sCn: 有一些故事是关于语源学的，关于语言的本质以及那些词语与我们周围的元素的偶然联系。

remMethod.val: 来自etymon(n. 词源， 字根)

trans.tranOther: the study of the origins, history and changing meanings of words
